name: custom order Rémi le panda
description: pour Marie-Ève Gagnon.

name: doll clothing set
description:
The perfect set to play dress up with your rousskine fabric doll.
I've made only two, one in pinkish colors, and one in green, black, mint colors.

each set contains;
-pair of black leggings
-polkadot swimsuit (or leotard)
-silk skirt
-white chenille knitted hat
-crocheted scarf
-tutu
-t-shirt
-aqua cowl
-a necklace and a starry headband (small pieces, 5 years and up) 

All these are safe for babies, but kids under 3 might have difficulty dressing the doll (mommy can play dress up!).

name: brooch
description:
a small brooch, perfect for your Christmas party or just to make your winter coat more joyful!

These are individually handmade, sewn with the machine, they all look a bit different. They are usually 1 inch wide or smaller. Fabric is sewn over vinyl for durability. Edges are raw the fabric unravels a bit but it's part of the charm of this product. 

Brooch is glued on. This brooch is not washable.

name: The Chouwi
description:
The Chouwi is a mystical creature, distant cousin of the unicorn. Small, he fits in the palm of a hand where he likes to take refuge and warble. The Chouwi is lively and cheerful, he likes to make people laugh and never sleeps alone. He keeps secret bettre than anyone since only his confident can understand him - the Chouwi doesn't speak, he makes adorable small noises, a very special language understood solely by the one who adopted him. Children are his best allies, with them he feels protected, loved and respected - the other animals make fun of him because he's clumsy and short.

***
Cotton and polyester fabrics.

Lightly filled with polyester, they feel mushy and soft.

Plastic eyes (safe for babies but please be vigilant, check frequently if their still well attached or choose to have embroidered eyes).

Approximately 8 inches tall. 

Machine washable, in cold water, on delicate. Dry flat.

name: Suzette
description:
Suzette has a collection of books. She's starting to acumulate bookcases full of them. She sorts them by color because it's prettier. One day she will be a librarian.

***

Finally a fabric doll you can dress up! Have fun making some new clothing for her, maybe a hat or boots.

Body is made out of an organic cotton knit, hair, dress and scarf is cotton and polyester jersey.

Lightly filled with polyester, they feel mushy and soft.

Hand embroidered eyes.

Approximately 9 inches tall. 

Machine washable, in cold water, on delicate. Dry flat.

name: Olivia
description:
Olivia is a princess.

***

Cotton and polyester fabrics. Leather gold crown.

Lightly filled with polyester, they feel mushy and soft.

Plastic eyes and nose (safe for babies but please be vigilant, check frequently if their still well attached or choose to have embroidered eyes).

Approximately 9 inches tall.

He's Sarah's cousin and loves to tease her for any good reason.

name: Loucas the owl
description:
Loucas likes fall, to roll in grass, kites and mushrooms. When his cousin, Gabrielle can't go to the park with him and play, he flights his kite. He loves to watch it float around, can spend hours just doing that without noticing. In the fall, Loucas also loves to jump in mountains of leaves. He watches the trees every day to see them change color. Mushroom is his favorite food, he takes the cap off and peels it, and he eats the stem first, keeps the best for last. He knows it's a bit weird, but he doesn't care.

***

Toys are machine knitted with 100% cotton yarn.

Filled with polyfester filling. All new material.

Eyes are embroider for total safety.

Approximately 8 inches tall. Since they're all handmade, shape and size vary.

Machine washable, in cold water, on delicate. Dry flat.

name: Georgette
description:
Georgette has a collection of butterflies. She hangs on to all kinds of fabric or paper butterflies, prints, fabrics. She loves the real one, catches them in jars, but always release them. One day she will be an entomologist.

***

Finally a fabric doll you can dress up! Have fun making some new clothing for her, maybe a hat or boots.

name: Gabrielle the owl
description:
Gabrielle likes to sing in the shower, the moon, making paper airplanes, and bubble gum. She is a very alive owl, she stops moving mainly to watch the moon, she finds it so peaceful. Gabrielle likes to spend her day at the park, playing with her friends, or even alone. With her cousin Loucas she plays with her yellow kite, with Cédric she builds airplanes, alone she plays in the sand box. This little owl is never bored. It's Lou, her sister who showed her bubble gum, and making bubbles, and she just loves it!

***

Toys are machine knitted with 100% cotton yarn.

Can be used as a phone case, or wallet. Fits an iphone 4, and maybe a 5 without a plastic case. Since they're made from scraps from the dolls, they all vary in size.

name: Camille the racoon
description:
Small raccoon with rattle, perfect for babies hands to grab (and to love!).

Camille is an artist. She paints whatever she can get her hands on. She adores when Charlie asks her to paint one of his creation. She sits on the floor of her room, takes the statuette very delicately in her hands and waits for her brother to tell her its story. Then she paints it with lots of love and attention. It's their most beautiful creations.

Charlie loves to carve wood, he does all kinds of statuettes ( his room is full of them ). Sometimes he plays with them, but he mainly likes to just watch them, and imagine lives. Someday he might be a writer. 

***

Machine knitted with cotton yarn.

Filled with polyfester filling. Child safe rattle insert. All new material.

Approximately 5 inches tall. Since they're all handmade, shape and size vary.

Machine washable, in cold water, on delicate. Dry flat.

name: Charlie the racoon
description:
Small raccoon with rattle, perfect for babies hands to grab (and to love!).

Charlie loves to carve wood, he does all kinds of statuettes ( his room is full of them ). Sometimes he plays with them, but he mainly likes to just watch them, and imagine lives. Someday he might be a writer. 

His sister Camille is an artist too. She paints whatever she can get her hands on. She adores when Charlie asks her to paint one of his creation. She sits on the floor of her room, takes the statuette very delicately in her hands and waits for her brother to tell her its story. Then she paints it with lots of love and attention. It's their most beautiful creations.

name: Rachel
description:
Rachel is the best friend ever. She goes crazy for everything shape like a heart! Rachel likes herbology, to play with rocks, scarves and lemonade. When it's pretty outside, she likes to sell limonade to neighbors. They mostly stop by to admire the pretty scarves she wears. Her favorite is the one with hearts, she's convinced she sells more when she's wearing it! 

***

Toys are machine knitted with 100% cotton yarn.

description:
Sally is the perfect doll for any little girl. She loves lace- anything with lace, taking long bath- she likes to pretend she's a mermaid, painting stars and eating white chocolate.

name: Bruno
description:
Bruno likes his big brother Edouard, puzzles, dogs and grilled-cheese sandwiches. The best day ever is when Edouard makes grilled-cheese sandwiches for lunch, and makes puzzles with him. Sometimes they play video games too, with big bowls of popcorn. They put strawberry licorice in their juice and use them as straws. Bruno is pretty shy, and when you become his friends, he's very loyal. With dogs he’s not shy at all, sometimes he thinks they can actually understand when he talks to them.

***

Dolls are machine knitted with 100% cotton yarn.

Filled with polyfester filling. All new material.

Eyes are embroider for total safety.

Approximately 10 inches tall. Since they're all handmade, shape and size vary.

Machine washable, in cold water, on delicate. Dry flat.

name: Cédric
description:
Cédric is a very curious little boy. He likes airplanes, black and white mice, digging holes and peanut butter. He doesn't like other mice as much, they're not as funny. He likes to spend rainy afternoons with Gabriel, making paper airplanes. They make tournaments, the fastest plane wins. Sometimes they let Lou, Gabriel’s big sister play, but her planes always win. When his sister, Rachel, lets him, Cédric sells peanut butter sandwiches at her lemonade stand, but he usually ends up eating them all!

***

Toys are machine knitted with 100% cotton yarn.

Filled with polyfester filling. All new material.

Eyes are embroider for total safety.

Approximately 8 inches tall. Since they're all handmade, shape and size vary.
